114.title: Someones making her wear.

choices: She asks Natsume to go potty.
She lets lose in her diaper.
She tries to hold it in.
1141.content:
"H-hold on, I already said you win, i-isn't that enough?" Blue tried to negotiate with Natsume as she was pulled over her lap with the gym leader's psychic powers, a pink bell collar put in place around her neck.
"Nope, we had an agreement." Natsume said as she pulled Blue's panties down to her knee's, groping her bottom and earning moans in return. "I'll enjoy giving you your punishment.." Natsume said happily, bringing her open hand down on blue's soft rear. Shekept this up for ten minutes, letting a sobbing and red-bottomed girl off her lap once she finished.

"I..I'll win this next time!" Blue declared, going to leave and tripping automatically.

"Not so fast~. That was only your punishment for losing, now our agreement comes into play." Natsume snapped her fingers and they were automatically warped to a pink, over-sized nursery in the back of the gym.

"You're mine for the nextyear." Natsume said happily, picking blue up and placing her on the changing table, stripping her then changing her into a thick white diaper and a bib.

"Now, the rules are to not use big girl talk, be a baby, and do whatever mommy says, understand?" Bluenodded meekly, feeling her bladder threaten to burst.
1141.title: Natsume(AKA Sabrina)

choices: Natsume doesn't notice blue is wet
11413.content:
Blue sits there on the changing table and looks around. The nursery seemed, nice.

It happens again, another sharp pain from her bladder. Why did she have to go so bad all of a sudden? Only moments ago she didn't have to go at all and now, she can barely hold on. Blue twitches, waiting for Natsume to do anything.

"Do you like your nursery little girl? It is all yours for the next year." The gym leader smiles and picks her up, carrying her over to the large crib by a wall of the room.

"But, I am to old to wear diapers. You can't do this to..." Blue was cut off as a pacifier was stuck into her mouth before being able to finish. Natsume places her in the crib and then walks away, leaving blue alone to think.

Once again she looks around the room, looking for a way out of this commitment. She was not sure she could handle being diapered for a whole year.

Another sharp pain hits her, causing her to bend forward in pain. Shaking her head she refuses to let Natsume win by peeing herself in this baby diaper. No, she could get out of here, after all she was a very skilled pokemon trainer. She attempts to look for escape routes, but it is all for naught. Every time something comes to mind, she loses herself in the pain of the bladder. By the time she had pushed her need to pee out of her mind, the thought she had originally been working on was gone.

Deciding that she at least had to start by climbing out of the crib, Blue stands up and attempts to lift herself over the bars of a crib that was obviously designed for kids her size. She manages to get one leg over before falling back and landing on her diapered butt. The shock of the hit sends a jolt through her causing her bladder to just give up and quit. With a gasp, and then a sigh of relief, Blue just gives up and lets it all flood into her diaper. She blushes madly, though surprisingly she didn't mind the warm feeling spreading around her privates and up to her rear.

Then she sees Natsume coming back and covers her now drenched, and probably sagging diaper, with both hands.
11413.title: She tries to hold it in.

114131.content:
Natsume enters the room and looks at Blue as she's holding her hands in front of her diaper blushing. "Oh, is baby trying to hide something from mommy?" Natsume cooed as she walked over to Blue as Blue walked up and saw her staring at her. Blue didn't want to answer her at all she wanted to hide this for as long as she could. Natsume leaned in closer changing her tone "Now answer me did baby wet herself or does she need to be punished for ignoring mommy."

Blue hesitantly moved her hands away revealing a soaked diaper that is starting to sag a little as she tried not to cry anymore than she already has while being here. "Now was that so hard?" Natsume said in a motherly tone lifting up Blue and taking her to the changing table as Blue blushed even more at the sound of her diaper being removed and blushing even more as she was wiped clean, oiled, powdered and finally a new thick white diaper was put on her.

"Now I think it's time for lunch my baby." Natsume said as she carried Blue to the kitchen.

151.title: Platina (AKA Dawn or Hikari)

choices: Go work at the local daycare
1512.content: Dawn tossed and turned in bed, she could never get the dream out of her head. To her misfortune, it began to replay once again. Dawn was six years old, and was dressing for school. Dawn looked in her closet for some undies, but something white caught her attention. Dawn pulled it out to see a diaper. She went to her mother still holding it. "Mommy, can I wear this to school?" Dawn asked. "No honey, I'm afraid you don't need those anymore, just leave it at home." Dawns mom said. "But." "Dawn, I said no, now put it away!" Dawn went back to her room and set the diaper on her dresser. However when Dawn went to grab her underwear, she picked up the diaper instead. Dawn went to school not noticing anything, until recess. Dawn was sitting on a log, admiring the pret view, when a boy snuck up behind her. He had a handful of worms and slipped them into Dawns diaper. She got up screaming and went deeper to dig them out. Dawn took her pants off to see she was wearing a diaper, she began panicking. Dawns normal undies covered her hole in case of accidents, the diaper didn't. Dawn giggled as she felt the slimy worms crawling into her body. Dawn ran to the nurse and had them all dug out. When Dawn got home, her mother sat there, tapping her foot. "Well well, look who it is. I got the call from your school about your diaper incident, and if you think it was funny to do that when I said no, then let's see how you enjoy wearing them for 3 more years." Her mom said. Since then, Dawn had worn diapers and remained ho e schooled, and finally was able to take them off on her 10th birthday, when she began her journey. Ever since, Dawn had always had nightmares about the experiment. But that night, a new thought crossed her mind, what if all the worms weren't properly dug out. Dawn shook the thought off, even so, it wouldn't do anything, and probably died. Though the thought of what could happen still crossed Dawns mind. The longer she thought, the scarier it got, so much so where she jolted up to get a breath. Dawn noticed one particular problem though, her bed was wet. Dawn cried in her mind and decided to sneak her sheets down stairs. When she got to the laundry room, she flipped the lights on to see her mom standing behind her. "Dawn what are you doing?" She asked. Dawn stood there frozen. "By the looks of it, your sheets need washing. Dawn I thought we've been over thi, DAWN!" She screamed. "What?!" Dawn asked. "Just look!" Her mom said concerned. Dawn looked down to see she was wetting herself again. "I didn't know mom! I didn't feel anything or know it was coming!" Dawn complained. "Come on, let's get you to the Pokecenter." Her mom said. Dawn was brought to the Pokecenter. After some ex-rays, nurse joy came out to tell the the information. "After scanning Dawn, we found what looks to be an ancient worm like Pokemon in her stomach. By the looks of it, it's been there for about 4 years. And also it looks like it had a bit of time to attach to the most active organ, and seeing as how where it may have got in, her bladder was the best spot. Unfortunately it became a large part of her bladder to the point where if it dies, so would the parts of her bladder it was attached to. Good news, it was only attached to one part. Bad news, without it, Dawn won't be able to controller bladder ever again." Nurse joy said nodding her head. "So, Dawn has to wear diapers now?" Her mom asked. "Forever." Nurse joy answered. Dawns mom turned away, and grew an evil smile while forcing out a." How unfortunate, I'll see to it that this happens. In her mind, Dawns mom was glad that Dawn would learn what it was like to be a helpless child. She brought Dawn home, and dressed her in her normal adventuring c,othes, but instead of undies, she put a purple diaper with pink stars on her. "Okay Dawn, I've schedueled for you to go on an ___________ for a while in your little diapers, I expect to hear from you a few times honey." She said shoving Dawn out the door. So, what did Dawn have to do?
1512.title: The nightmare

15121.content:
Dawn groaned, standing at the computer of the local pokemon center tugging on the back of her skirt, with only one pokeball in front of her. "Mommy actually expects me to st-start over like a newlyborn...?" The young women sighed as she let out her newborn turtwig, barely hiding her diaper under her short skirt as she left the center.
'I thought I was over with this!' Dawn thought as she waddled to the next route, blushing light crimson in fear that others could hear the crinkling of her diaper, or worse, smell it.

"Not another one!" The young trainer cried, stamping her feet as her turtwig razor leaf'd another pokemon into submission. She noticed that it was getting late and decided to start heading back to the center and rest. As she turned around though she found her face buried in soft mounds, falling on her padded rear and looking up at the blonde woman. "C-cynthia!"
"Hello cutie~ cute diapers." Dawn flushed as the champion lifted her up onto her feet by her armpits, giving her a pat on her bottom. "Your mommy asked me to come watch over you, and give you a little test." Dawn gulped as Cynthia took out a pokeball, releasing a higher-leveled monferno.
"P..please don't.." Dawn whimpered, her helpless turtwig getting blown back into it's pokeball.
"Looks like you failed the test.." Cynthia muttered, trying to feign surprise as she fished through her thin black purse. Dawn fell on her padded rear once again, tearing up as she felt the padding grow moist and swell between her legs. "Oh no, please don't cry sweetie!" Cynthia cooed, rubbing her back until she had calmed down. She smiled once she had calmed down, standing back up and helping her to her feet.
"Now because you failed the test, you have two choices." Cynthia presented the physical manifestations of the first choice from her purse, a rattle and purple pacifier. "You can come back home where you'll be raised back up from infancy, or.." For the second option Cynthia presented a leash, collar with a bell on it, and a baby yellow pacifier. "You can come with me and I'll be your 'trainer'. I'll train you to become a trainer again. It's your choice."
15121.title: Go on and adventure

151212.content:
Dawn pointed at the leash, soliciting a smile from Cynthia. "I'm a tr-trainer, not a baby!" The 18 year old cried, sniffling and wiping away her tears.
"Good girl, I knew you would make the right decision!" The champion beamed, fastening the black and yellow collar around Dawn's neck, the word's "Dawn" and "Property of Cynthia" engraved on it. Dawn whimpered a little as her new trainer picked her up, persuading her to suck on the yellow pacifier. "There there sweetie, I'll get you changed, go ahead and sleep.."

"D-don't spank... D-dawn..." The young girl murmured behind her pacifier as her eyes opened lazily. Dawn flushed as she saw a pair of blue eyes staring into hers, framed by her golden locks. In Dawn's panic she tried to get away, finding herself trapped in Cynthia's embrace.
"Good morning sweetie.."Cynthia yawned, giving Dawn a kiss on the forehead before she sat up to stretch out her tired limbs, in nothing more than a tank top and panties.
Dawn continued to sit there blushing as Cynthia picked her up, humming as she carried her to a changing table and layed her down. Dawn regained some of her composure as she realized that she had been stripped down to just a thick pink diaper, crying out and spitting out her pacifier as she covered her dress.
"C-cynthi-" Dawn quieted down as she received a slap to the bottom and her pacifier was re-inserted.
"Now now sweety, we're starting your training for today." Dawn gulped nervously, squirming as she, felt the familiar cool feel and sweet scent of baby powder hitting her skin. "All you need to know for now is that you aren't allowed to speak unless told otherwise." Dawn nodded obediently, her diaper crinkling loudly as it was brought in-between her legs and taped shut. This diaper was even thicker than the last, pure white with eeveelutions playing on the tapes.
"Now, for breakfast you have a choice between milk, or something in the cafeteria.."
151212.title: Dawn takes the leash.

154331.content:
"Nnn.." I groan as I wake up, opening my eyes groggily. The last thing I remember was giving a young brunette woman who managed to defeat me.. that's right, her name was May, I gave May the key to the hall of fame, then I went unconscious for some reason. I sit up and begin to examine my surroundings, taking a moment to realize where I am. Well, I don't know exactly where I am still. There's yellow bars around me, like a wooden cell, except the top not to far above my head is open, and there's some kind of mobile with pokemon on it spinning above my head, a lullaby playing from it. But nevermind that, what's more concerning is my predicament. I try to stand up to get out but I'm quickly held down, chains on the slick things secured over my hands keeping them down. When I look, I realize that I'm wearing white, thumbless mittens. I sit back down with some loud crinkling sound, something soft on my bottom and between my legs... w-wait, that's a fucking diaper! A thick, white diaper, with prints of pink pokemon on it! I try to cry out, but I suddenly realize that there's some kind of plastic nipple in my mouth, strapped in my mouth tight. I can't do much more than make a muffled cry behind my pacifier, kicking my legs against the mattress and sighing when I calm down some. I gasp as I begin to examine my surroundings, quickly realizing I'm not alone.
My crib is located by the wall of a nursery, right in front of a window in fact, out of which I can see that I'm on the front floor of a building located in some bustling metropolitan city. Oh my god, people can see me, look away, look away! As I looked away, I got to get a better look at the nursery. It's really big, bigger than I would assume any nursery would be. It has a generic background, and everything you'd expect a nursery to have, multiples of some things, like changing tables and playpens, and there were two other cribs, also pressed against the wall next to windows, just like mine, I can't move enough to really see what's in them though, probably nothing.
"Oh, you woke up." I gasp and jump a little as I suddenly hear a voice from the playpen near my crib, quickly laying down and covering my naked chest, since I'm only in my diaper. I gulp and look over, gasping at what I see. "D-Don't look at me like that, I'm in the same situation as you!" The pink haired girl says to me, on her knees in the playpen. Her face is as red as a beet and I can see why, looking at how she's dressed... or rather, not. She has a pink collar around her neck with a bell on it, a pair of pink buneary ears put on her head, a pacifier in her mouth that's strapped to her collar, pink thumbless mittens that are cuffed together on her hands, and last but certainly not least, a thick pink diaper, with a tail poking out of it.. which must be a butt plug, poor girl. "You should go back to sleep while you can, before-!" She jumps a little and lays down as she hears a jostling sound, instantly quieting down. I look around quickly for what she seems to be afraid of, it's

15522.content:
"That was way to easy!" Saphire complained, returning her pokemon to it's ball. Erica looked down sadly as she returned her jumpluff to it's ball, looking for her gym badge and managing a small smile as she handed saphire a badge.

"Hmm... this isn't enough!" Saphire said with a pout, putting the badge in her case and grabbing Erica's hand, looking at her sternly.

It was about 4 years after saphire's original journey in Hoenn, and she was now on a journey to conquer every region's gym.

"I'm sorry saphire-san, only water-type trainers have been challenging my gym lately.." Erica muttered, unable to look the trainer in the eye.

"I don't care, you're barely even gym leader quality!" Saphire fumed, sitting down on a bench and pulling erica over her knee.

"W..what are you doing!?" Erica asked in shock as saphire secured her hands behind her back and began opening the bottom part of her yukata.

"I'm putting you in your place! Oh, it looks like you're already part-way there." Saphire said with a grin, poking the pull-up between her legs teasingly.

"I..I have long battles sometimes, okay..?" She murmured, blushing bright red.

"Well, that just makes it easier!" Saphire cheered as she slapped erica's bottom hard enough to make her yelp and tear up.

She repeated this for about 10 minutes before placing the red-bottomed, sobbing erica on the ground.

"C..can you please l-leave now..?" Erica managed to say, her pull-up now soaked and leaking.

"Why would I do that? This is barely the beginning of your punishment!" Saphire announced as she attached a collar around erica's neck, tugging on it to get her up.

She had already been at it for 5 minutes, and Lyra was convinced that if this kept on she'd never get her gym badge. Nonetheless, Whitney's childish behavior did not stop. Eventually the younger girl got sick of it, grabbing her by the hand and forcing her on her feet. "Come on! If you're going to act like a baby, then I'll give you something to cry about!" Lyra brought her outside, un-phased by whitney's juniors attempts to stop her.

Lyra led Whitney right outside her gym, sitting on a bench and pulling her over her knee, were any passer-by could see the embarrassment she was about to go through. Whitney came to her senses as Lyra's hand landed on her bare bottom the first time, giving her a yelp and a jump. Whitney struggled, trying to get away as her bottom was assailed, but the younger girl was somehow able to easily keep the city girl there as she painted her rear red. 5 minutes later Whitney was crying anew, her hide thoroughly tanned. As Lyra pulled up her shorts and sat her next to her on the bench, she whimpered and went to get up. She received another hard spank and was pulled back onto the bench.

"Oh no, I'm not done with you. If someone like YOU, who probably hasn't even passed potty training-" Lyra indicated to the wet spot on whitney's pants, the young women having lost control as she was spanked-"can become a gym leader, then I'm going to have to take matters into my own hands and train you myself." As she spoke Lyra pulled out a collar and leash that she normally kept on hand for difficult pokemon, fastening it around whitney's neck.

"I..I'm sowwy! P..pwease, I'w g-give you a g-gym badge, j-just wet me go!" Whitney pleaded between her bawling, holding Lyra's hands.

"Nope! I plan to have fun with this..." The young trainer grinned sadistically, tugging on the leash.

Cynthia tried to scream as Platina pulled out a thick white square, unfolding the adult sized baby diaper under her bottom and settig her on it.

"From now on you will refer to me as mommy, and follow my orders to the word, got it?" Cynthia shook her head no, moaning into her binky as Platina rubbed baby powder and lotion into her diaper area, shaving her big girl hair down there off first. With a stern look platina put Cynthia's legs together and raised her bottom into the air. 15533222211.content:
"Hey there Shauna, why'd you call me over?" Serena greeted her friend at the door to her house. It was her first time visiting Shauna's house so she wore her pretty little black dress, although Shauna's house was about the same size as her's. serena took off her shoes at the door and called for her friend once again. She heard Shauna say something unintelligable from the living room and rushed to her, bursting out in laughter as she saw Shauna dressed as normal, but sucking on a pacifier.
"O-oh my god, you're so cute, just like a little baby!" Shauna blushed light red, smiling behind the rubber nipple while Serena doubled over in laughter. Suddenly the door shut behind Serena and Shauna's Gardevoir emerged from behind the door. Before Serena could respond a blue light enveloped her wrists and ankles, binding them together like handcuffs. The laughter suddenly left Serena as she struggled uselessly against her restraints, falling to the ground on her bum. "W-what the hell is this, Shauna!?"
